title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After following the steps to import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, deleting the image file 'image1.jpg' from the outline image, and renaming 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg', the image is not refreshed or displayed in the layout view.
EB: The image 'image1.jpg' should be refreshed and displayed in the layout view after renaming 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
SR:
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
